rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment does not contain high-potency verbs, potent metaphors, superlatives, or critical alert phrases.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Reports confirmation of outbreak, lacking explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation of the specified types.
Describes action taken related to surveillance/response ('confirmed the H5N1 outbreak after analysing samples').
